Butcher.synopsis: This dialog is started by talking to the Butcher character in the Colony. The player may ask the Butcher questions or recruit them as a temporary follower inside the Colony. Alternatively, this dialog runs through a flag in case the player has already met the Butcher, or if the Butcher was recruited as a follower. The Butcher sounds eerily vacant unless otherwise specified, his mind destroyed by his time in Colony.
Butcher.how_to_trigger: Enter the kitchen on the lower floor of the Colony, and talk to the Butcher. The Butcher can be found at 738 -38 -109 in SCL_Main_A.

Butcher_37.speaker: Narrator
Butcher_37.text: *No will sparks behind his eyes. His mind has been hollowed out, to better echo the commands of the collective.*

Butcher_19.speaker: Lae'zel
Butcher_19.text: A ghaik thrall. The only way to save it is to kill it.

Butcher_24.speaker: Narrator
Butcher_24.text: *You could kill it, end its miserable life of enslavement. Surely that would be the humane thing to do...*

Butcher_9.speaker: Narrator
Butcher_9.text: *Or you could take advantage of its vulnerability and plunder what's left of its hollow mind for anything that could serve you.*

Butcher_26.speaker: Narrator
Butcher_26.text: *You focus on the source of the power, but it is quiet and still. It needs to rest.*

Butcher_36.speaker: Narrator
Butcher_36.text: *Pliant as well-worn boots, his mind turns to his work. Chop. Cut. Sort.*

Butcher_47.speaker: Narrator
Butcher_47.text: *Shiver of impact. Crack of bone. He removes the brains, digs free the squirming tadpoles. The unworthy ones, given over to the illithids. To become.*

Butcher_42.speaker: Chop
Butcher_42.text: Part of One Mind. Four little feet. Dancing. To same song.
Butcher_42.context: NodeContext: Vacant; a decent pause between each sentence

Butcher_17.speaker: Narrator
Butcher_17.text: *With a lurch, you realise he means the intellect devourers. Here the brains are harvested - made part of the hivemind.*

Butcher_13.speaker: Chop
Butcher_13.text: But there is one. Little. Kitty. Dances. To another song.

Butcher_55.speaker: Chop
Butcher_55.context: CinematicNodeContext: Tilting his head at us in vacant confusion / interest

Butcher_1.speaker: Chop
Butcher_1.context: NodeContext: Vacant; a decent pause between each word

Butcher_39.speaker: Player
Butcher_39.text: What did you do to all these people?

Butcher_48.speaker: Player
Butcher_48.text: Where can I find this 'Little Kitty'?

Butcher_59.speaker: Chop
Butcher_59.text: Locked. Up. Bad kitty. Thinks it is. Other.

Butcher_0.speaker: Player
Butcher_0.text: About that creature in the cage...

Butcher_54.speaker: Chop
Butcher_54.text: Bad kitty. Sings wrong song. Must-fix.

Butcher_43.speaker: Chop
Butcher_43.text: Cut. Chop. Until it is us again.

Butcher_29.speaker: Player
Butcher_29.text: Let it come with me. We sing the same song.

Butcher_33.speaker: Chop
Butcher_33.text: ...Yes. Yes. I hear. Go then. Make. Happy?

Butcher_57.speaker: Chop
Butcher_57.context: NodeContext: Confusion and denial building into rage - attacking after node

Butcher_60.speaker: Player
Butcher_60.text: Let it come with me. We sing the same song.

Butcher_46.speaker: Narrator
Butcher_46.text: *You focus on the source of the power, but it is quiet and still. It needs to rest.*

Butcher_45.speaker: Player
Butcher_45.text: I'll take the creature with me. It won't disrupt the hivemind anymore.

Butcher_11.speaker: Chop
Butcher_11.text: ...Yes. Yes. Take - only One song remains.

Butcher_56.speaker: Chop
Butcher_56.context: NodeContext: Confusion and denial building into rage - attacking after node

Butcher_22.speaker: Player
Butcher_22.text: Free the creature or I'll kill you and every one of your creations.

Butcher_28.speaker: Chop
Butcher_28.text: No. No. Kitties good. Sing One song. Take other. Away!

Butcher_34.speaker: Chop
Butcher_34.context: NodeContext: Confusion and denial building into rage - attacking after node

Butcher_7.speaker: Player
Butcher_7.text: Do as you will with it.

Butcher_4.speaker: Player
Butcher_4.text: About the 'little kitty' in the cage...

Butcher_38.speaker: Player
Butcher_38.text: I need to find your master - Ketheric.

Butcher_2.speaker: Chop
Butcher_2.text: Down. Deep. One of Three. One of Three.
Butcher_2.context: InternalNodeContext: This is the only moment where he becomes almost lucid/emotiveNodeContext: Breathlessly/suddenly audibly fearful, almost sobbing - before immediately returning to being monosyllabic once this line is over

Butcher_14.speaker: Player
Butcher_14.text: Why don't I send you to join all these creatures you butchered?
